attributes.action: 500,000 Signatures on an E-Petition should trigger Referendum
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned petition the government bring into law that any e-petition receiving 500,000 signatures should trigger a national referendum on the proposal in the petition and that the result of that referendum must be adopted as policy by the government. We also petition that the period between the receiving on 500,000 signatures and the referendum being held should be no more than 4 months.
